gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `ProvisionBalanceInsurance` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `ProvisionBalanceInsurance` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `ProvisionBalanceInsuranceMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ProvisionBalanceInsuranceEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ProvisionBalanceInsuranceEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ProvisionBalanceInsuranceStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ProvisionBalanceInsuranceStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ProvisionBalanceInsuranceMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ProvisionBalanceInsuranceMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ChangeAsConsequence` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChangeAsConsequence')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChangeAsConsequence return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfChangeAsConsequenceDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfChangeAsConsequenceDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfChangeAsConsequenceCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfChangeAsConsequenceCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ResultProbabilitySystems` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ResultProbabilitySystems')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ResultProbabilitySystems return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfResultProbabilitySystemsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfResultProbabilitySystemsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfResultProbabilitySystemsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsActuarialReportBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfResultProbabilitySystemsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
